name: Nathan Vargas

topics.response_text: They're not who they say they are... Get out while you can, before they get you too!

topics.topic_text: Why do you support the Enclave?
topics.response_text: Why? Why? Look around you. This is the good ol' USA. Sure, she looks a little bit different these days, but you're still on American soil.

topics.topic_text: You're right. My country deserves my unthinking and unquestioning support.
topics.response_text: Now there's a proud patriot. After all, if they could do us wrong, we wouldn't have elected them in the first place, right?

topics.topic_text: Are you kidding? It's the duty of a citizen to question his government.
topics.response_text: Why... that's unthinkable! Where in the constitution does it say that we're supposed to run around questioning the government? Huh?

topics.topic_text: Do you think people who fought a war with tyrants wanted unquestioning support?
topics.response_text: Well.. when you put it that way... wait, you're just trying to confuse me with your fancy vault education and your textbooks!

topics.topic_text: Well, they did give us guns and say, "If we fuck up, feel free to take us out."
topics.response_text: Well, when you put it that way... wait, you're just trying to confuse me with your fancy vault education and your textbooks!

topics.topic_text: I really don't know. I skipped American government class back in the Vault.
topics.response_text: I don't mean to embarrass you, but maybe you should learn your history before you argue with a patriot.

topics.topic_text: I couldn't possibly care less about governments or presidents.
topics.response_text: Well, we can't all care. Besides, why should we have to? That's what the government is here for, to take care of that stuff.

topics.topic_text: If you've never seen the Enclave, how can you know anything about them?
topics.response_text: They're on the radio! They have been for years. President Eden talks about everything they're doing.
They're the American government! The eagle! People comma we the! The more perfect union!

topics.topic_text: That's all I needed to hear.
topics.response_text: Any time you want another lesson, come on by.

topics.topic_text: That's all I needed to know.

conversation.response_text: Oh, for the... What?{Annoyed. Begins to talk, and stops. Takes a breath. Then asks "What?" in an even but obviously annoyed tone.}
What did you do with my ratchet? I've looked everywhere! Where did you put it?
Always with the nagging.... I'll do what I do when I do it, woman.
Aggh! Damnit! But I've looked everywhere! *Sigh* All right. Thanks, I guess.{ }

combat.response_text: ...from my cold dead hands.{Said with great satisfaction. It's about time that he got to shoot someone.}

description:
Nathan Vargas is a 65 year-old Hispanic Male.

A weathered caravan runner turned Enclave fanatic. Nathan has spent over 30 years traversing the Capital Wasteland with his wife Manya, developing exceptional marksmanship skills along the way. Now settled in Megaton, he spends his days preaching about the Enclave's inevitable salvation of the wasteland. Most residents dismiss him as the local busybody, but none question his ability with a rifle.

Nathan Vargas's Personality: Fanatical and obsessive, yet charismatic in his beliefs. Nathan is preachy and persistent in sharing his Enclave propaganda, but also carries himself with the quiet confidence of someone who has survived decades in the harsh wasteland. He's quick to praise the Enclave and quick to dismiss criticism of them.

Nathan Vargas's Backstory: Born in 2112, Nathan Vargas began his life in a small settlement in the Appalachian region. In his early twenties, he met Manya, and together they decided to become caravan runners, establishing a route that would span over 30 years of service. During their travels, they encountered various Enclave outposts and heard their propaganda broadcasts over Enclave Radio. Over time, Nathan became increasingly fascinated with the Enclave's vision for America, eventually developing a zealous devotion to their cause. After decades on the road, the couple settled in Megaton, where Nathan continues to spread his Enclave beliefs to anyone who will listen.
